typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{Cliente ID} as string,
		Nombre as string,
		Apellido as string,
		Segmento as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	limit: 100,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	documentForm: 'documentPerLine') ~> ExtractCustomer
ExtractCustomer sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SaveAll
